column4: where can i edit the boot, coz everytime i boot i promted 3 linux and 3 fail safe.. i want to remove the duplicated ones.. can anyone help
they should also be removed if you remove the old kernel packages
how to remove the old kernel package?
which you might as well remove, because you can't boot them anyway if you remove them from the grub menu :)
how  to remove the old package?
coz i update yesterday and when i turn on my pc on.. thats what i got..
search for linux-image in synaptic and see what you have installed. then remove the ones you don't want
do "cat /proc/version" to see which kernel you're running. you probably don't want to remove that :)
ok, keep the latest version of that and uninstall the rest
what will i do " mark for removal" or " mark for complete removal" which one?
complete, it will also remove the configuration for those packages
